short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluates highlighted or selected text in the amazing Wolfram Alpha

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a context menu item that submits highlighted or selected text for evaluation in the amazing Wolfram Alpha. 

Not affiliated with Wolfram in any way.
